item.title: Top Bartenders Name Their Favorite Drinking Cities
item.description:
Top Bartenders Name Their Favorite Drinking Cities

These are the best drinking cities, according to some of America's best bartenders, including New York, New Orleans, Portland,…

item.title: Drinks: Smoked Manhattan
item.description:
Drinks: Smoked Manhattan

Our good friends at Gin & Luck were kind enough to mix up a giant batch of Smoked Manhattan's for the WC-003 trip. When you can't have a fire, the next best thing is a fire in a flask. Here's the recipe for the mixologist in you.

item.title: How to Build a Solid Drinking Library
item.description:
How to Build a Solid Drinking Library

Are there places I like as much as great bars? Yes: great bookshops. And if I had to pick a favorite in the latter category, it's Dog Ears Book Barn in the little town of Hoosick, N.Y. Conveniently, it's just a little ways down Route 7 from the Man of Kent, one of America's best bars.
